Package com.sebastienguillemin.wswrl.core.rule.atom

Interface WSWRLAtom

All Superinterfaces:
org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.HasIRI
All Known Subinterfaces:
WSWRLBuiltInAtom, WSWRLClassAtom, WSWRLDataPropertyAtom, WSWRLDataRangeAtom, WSWRLDifferentIndividualsAtom, WSWRLObjectPropertyAtom, WSWRLPropertyAtom<ObjectType>, WSWRLSameIndividualsAtom, WSWRLUnaryAtom<A>
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractWSWRLAtom, AbstractWSWRLProperty, AbstractWSWRLUnaryAtom, DefaultWSWRLBuiltInAtom, DefaultWSWRLClassAtom, DefaultWSWRLDataPropertyAtom, DefaultWSWRLDataRangeAtom, DefaultWSWRLDifferentIndividualsAtom, DefaultWSWRLObjectPropertyAtom, DefaultWSWRLSameIndividuals
public interface WSWRLAtom extends org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.HasIRI
A WSWRLRule atom associated with a weight ranging in [0; 1].
